title: Papyrus Fragments Inscribed in Aramaic
description:
Fragmentary Aramaic papyrus. Five fragments form an Aramaic marriage contract. One large fragment consisting of three folds with four lines of text. Four small separate fragments apparently part of same text. Reverse uninscribed.
This fragment belongs to the fragment group 47.218.13.
Condition: Very incomplete.
dimensions:
Glass: 8 13/16 x 9 15/16 in. (22.4 x 25.3 cm)
Largest Fragment: 4 3/4 x 6 1/8 in. (12 x 15.5 cm)
credit_line: Bequest of Theodora Wilbour from the collection of her father, Charles Edwin Wilbour

museum_location.name: This item is not on view
